instruction: open Google Chrome icon in the dock.
Click on the URL bar at the top of the page.
go to the booking.com website url.
press key to go to the booking.com website.
Click on the flight section.
Click the button with the plane icon and the text 'Rome All airports'.
Click the close icon on the 'Rome All airports' tag.
Type the Bologna as the departure location.
Click the checkbox next to the 'BLQ Bologna Guglielmo Marconi Airport' suggestion.
Click on the destination input field labeled 'Where to?'
Select 'Paris All airports' to set it as the destination.
Click on the date selection field.
Adjust the view downwards to see the full calendar.
In the August 2025 calendar, click on the number 4 to set it as the departure date.
Select August 8th as the end date for the trip.
Start the search process.
Click on the search button.
Click on the cheap flights option and scroll down a bit.
View details of the first flight information.
Success! The cheapest flight is now visible.
